column5: I hope the spring spawn for walleye is good.   Saw a couple guys fishing the bottom of Burleigh Falls today just up from Stoney. Signs all over about Fish Sanctuary.  😐
Hope you called the mnr tips line with their license plate numbers
Dollars to donuts they’ll have status cards if their obvious about it.  Same thing happens at Buckhorn every year.
Forgive me asking, what are status cards?
indegenous ID Which usually allows you to fish within your treaty grounds. Being Metis status doesnt mean you get to do whatever the hell you want.
Thank you for the clarification. In Alberta no one was even reacting when something like that was happening. Only me

The Walleye spawn here on Lake Erie has been going on for a few weeks now, the Perch seem to need help? https://ohiodnr.gov/wps/portal/gov/odnr/discover-and-learn/safety-conservation/about-odnr/news/yellow-perch-daily-limit-reduced?fbclid=IwAR12VZUwbffAdfxQHst_F7GgWrThkxmDCQGyJ7kXYg4fFRUVg3B5_SyBAUo
What is Mites status?  I was under the impression that they have the right to fish and hunt whenever/wherever they want as long as it’s for their own use
Metis,  when non indigenous got hitched up with natives and made Metis.
Nope, it's gotta be in their territory or treaty.    Everywhere else the normal FMZ rules need to be followed.
My bad with the autocorrect lol what Bill said
